queries.AllFromActiveWF: select id, workflow__sys, type__sys, document__sys, document_version__sys, object_name__sys, object_record_id__sys from active_workflow_item__sys

queries.AllFromInactiveWF: select id, workflow__sys, type__sys, document__sys, document_version__sys, object_name__sys, object_record_id__sys from inactive_workflow_item__sys

queries.documentsFromSMEReview: SELECT id, workflow__sys, type__sys FROM active_workflow_item__sys WHERE workflow__sys = 1

queries.allDocsId: SELECT id, minor_version_number__v, major_version_number__v, name__v FROM documents
